actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 422(c) of the Higher Education Act of 1965, relating to the eligibility of new State guarantee agencies for advances to reserve funds under such section.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to change the date after which States establishing interest subsidy programs for guaranteed student loans may receive advances to reserves for making insurance payments under the State guaranteed loan program.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 422(c) of the Higher Education Act of 1965, relating to the eligibility of new State guarantee agencies for advances to reserve funds under such section.
